Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.1 Sappaccayaduka » 2.1.3 Paccayavāra » 2.1.3.1--4 Paccayānulomādi
2.1.3.1--4.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaccayaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānulomādi
Vibhaṅgavāra
7.
557Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  sappaccayaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  vatthuṃ paccayā sappaccayā khandhā.
558Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
